subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Andrew Talansky, one of the United States’ top road cyclists, never expected to spend the second half of the Tour de France watching the race from poolside in Spain.
snippet: Andrew Talansky, one of the United States’ top road cyclists, never expected to spend the second half of the Tour de France watching the race from poolside in Spain.
